text: @realDonaldTrump You stoke the flames of racism and incite/ hire violence. YOU HAVE DONE NOTHING for 3 1/2 years but divide our country! Youre using Antifa crap to divert us from the catastrophe you caused us with the coronavirus. CATASTROPHE!! JOE BIDEN WILL BE POTUS! https://t.co/7Gp7ygrYIN
